Now, compiling all this into C code. 

The steps would be:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    int n, q;
    scanf("%d %d", &n, &q);

    char c[n+1];
    scanf("%s", c);  // Read the string.

    int range[q][2]; // 2D array for the queries.

    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
        scanf("%d %d", &range[i][0], &range[i][1]);
    }

    int frag[n+1]; // array from 0 to n.
    int rui[n+1];  // cumulative counts.

    // Initialize all elements to zero
    memset(frag, 0, sizeof(frag));
    memset(rui, 0, sizeof(rui));

    // Process from i=2 to n inclusive
    for (int i=2; i<=n; i++) {
        if (c[i-2] == 'A' && c[i-1] == 'C') {
            frag[i]++;
        }
        rui[i] = rui[i-1] + frag[i];
    }

    // Process queries
    for (int i=0; i<q; i++) {
        int left = range[i][0];
        int right = range[i][1];
        printf("%d\n", rui[right] - rui[left]);
    }

    return 0;
}
